original_text: For he saith to Moses, I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion.
korean_text: 모세에게 이르시되 내가 긍휼히 여길 자를 긍휼히 여기고 불쌍히 여길 자를 불쌍히 여기리라 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 긍휼히 여길 자를 긍휼히 여기고

sentences.original_text: and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 불쌍히 여길 자를 불쌍히 여기리라
